item.description:
üëã Hello

I’m a computational chemist and application specialist working at CSC ‚Äì IT Center for Science, the high-performance computing center of Finland. Previously, as part of my doctoral thesis project at Aalto University, I explored solid‚Äìliquid interfaces and electrocatalysis using computational methods, mostly density functional theory and molecular dynamics. This research helps us understand how to accurately model electrochemical energy conversion processes such as the production of green hydrogen.

In my current position at CSC, I support scientists and industrial R&D professionals in using supercomputers and high-performance simulation software such as CP2K and GROMACS. Besides one-on-one consultation, I also maintain and develop our software environment and participate in organizing customer training events.

‚úâÔ∏è Contact

You can reach me by email at rasmus.kronberg@pm.me. Feel free to also connect with me on LinkedIn or GitHub.

üéì Education

  • D.Sc. (Tech.) in Computational Chemistry (2022)
    Aalto University, FI
  • M.Sc. (Tech.) in Chemistry (2018)
    Aalto University, FI
    Minor: Engineering Physics
  • B.Sc. (Tech.) in Chemical Engineering (2016)
    Aalto University, FI
    Minor: Engineering Physics

üìù Selected publications

See my Google Scholar profile for the full list.

    cover pdf
